Typing IM BAAACK with my eyes closed and my nose.

lk,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,mfvbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbl

I muss ny keyvorad

Turned out better than expected.

kerman

What.

Okay lets try and type jebediah.

jebediah

WTH

what about astrophysics

astrophsics

UMG

astronautics

astronautics.

I know my keyboard all too well.

I know my keyboard all too well. WHAT WHY HOW.

Kerman with just my thumb and my eyes closed:

lrt,n there ya go!

Kerman wth my nose and eyes closed

mirmksb

Das good.

I'll try "Livestreaming shortly" with my mic (and without using backspace)

llivestreaming hortly

Well, almost. I hate to admit that was just my practice round. Time to do it with my eyes closed as well!

lllllpbtftshhnr6n

Beautiful... wait, did I seriously hit L correctly at first?

This is text that I hope doesn't get jumbled.

Eyes closed mode:

This is text that I gope don't get jumbled.

Pretty good.

Kerbal space program with eyes closed

Kerbal space program....

Thats scary.

Kerbal Space Program. Woo, eyes closed FTW.

Now, I'd like to ask the user below me to type Kerbal Space Program with their elbows.

LKRBSAS.L XDÃƒâ€¡PSACRE PROGGTSAM

Oh. That went well.

kerbal space program

Wow, I actually did it. I knew my ultra-sharp elbows would prove an evolutionary advantage someday.

Alright, now to type "i can think of words to say" with my eyes closed.

i can think of words to say

WOW
I don't get how typing stuff with your eyes closed is a challenge... are all of ye uncultured primitives who have to practice the art of the hunt and peck?!

I don't get how typing stuff with your eyes closed is a challenge... are all of ye uncultured primitives who have to practice the art of the hunt and peck?!

No, precisely why I can type properly with my eyes closed.

this is random text I am typing with my eyes closed. Let's see how I do.

Wow.
This is also being typed with my eyes closed.

Typing "If at first you don't succeed, add more boosters!" with my pinky and my eyes closed on my phone with auto-correct off:

If at fitsy you dont sjcxeed, add mkre .Kksters!

Typing. On the apple keyboard in the borizontL typing mode on ios.

K.

Anf so oir jrto, Comrsfe Eolgr tried tjr cjsllrmvgr.

... And so our hero, Comrade Wolfe tries the challenge.

FYI, I do a very high-speed hunt and peck. About 90% of my typing is with my two pointer fingers. Just for giggles I did an online typing test -- 47 WPM going back to correct mistakes.

Might have to try ASETNIOP next go 'round.

Going to type "Kerbal Space Program" with my eyes closed on the iOS keyboard.

Kerbal space program.

Thanks autocorrect.

Going to try typing "Have a good day, thank you" with my left hand on a phone.. no corrections.

Have A gokod dahyh, thank you.

A Monty Python quote: "Look, strange women lying in ponds, distributing swords is no basis for a system of government!" with eyes closed.

Look, trange women lying in ponds, distributing swords is no basis for a ststem of government!

(Wow, much closer than I expected... a couple times I was positive I had my hands in the wrong place...)

Another one, for fun: "You can't expect to wield supreme executive power just because some watery tart threw a sword at you." (again, eyes closed)

You can't expect to weild supreme execitove power because some watery tart threw a sword t you.
